entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Rainbow Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:34 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: High Level Airport 7:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 7:35 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:35 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:35 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
